thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-FDA, FTC Warn Companies For Selling Illegal, Unapproved Opioid Cessation Products Using Deceptive Claims

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FDA, FTC Warn Companies For Selling Illegal, Unapproved Opioid Cessation Products Using Deceptive Claims
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - U.S. Food and Drug Administration:
* FDA, FTC WARN COMPANIES FOR SELLING “ILLEGAL, UNAPPROVED OPIOID CESSATION PRODUCTS USING DECEPTIVE CLAIMS”
* U.S. FDA SAYS FDA, AND THE FEDERAL TRADE COMMISSION ON JAN 24 POSTED JOINT WARNING LETTERS TO MARKETERS, DISTRIBUTORS OF 12 OPIOID CESSATION PRODUCTS‍​
* ‍U.S FDA - LETTERS SENT TO COS SELLING UNAPPROVED OPIOID CESSATION PRODUCTS STATE THAT FAILURE TO CORRECT VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN LAW ENFORCEMENT ACTION Source text for Eikon:
